src:
Driver somehow unaware of rocky landslide he's about to drive into
06 Nov 2019, 12:36 by Rob Beschizza



Driver Andy Edmonds spotted the police and film crew at the side of the road, but not the enormous pile of rocks they were dealing with. "I didn't even see it!" he says, unnecessarily.
